title: Jake Humphrey invokes the spectre of Brent in his ramblings
text:
A most peculiar discovery this week during a tour of football and television’s highways and byways. Jake Humphrey, the BT Sport presenter, would seem to have reinvented himself as a motivational speaker.

Jake, largely regarded as a solid and inoffensive chap, and as the sort of television presenter you could take home to mother, first showed signs of being a bit special with his contributions on social media at around the time A-level results came out in 2012.

In what was surely a well-meaning gesture, Jake tweeted that he had made a pig’s ear of his A-levels and, well, just look at me now: a famous and, doubtless, wealthy television presenter, on first name terms with Rio Ferdinand, Canaries...
description: A most peculiar discovery this week during a tour of football and television’s highways and byways.
